name: Allianz SE
bossPosition: Chairman of the Board of Management
goal:
Allianz is an international financial service company. Since over 125 years, we offer products and solutions in insurance and asset management.

As Allianz, we are:

servicing 88 million customers in over 70 countries with over 140.000 employees;
among the top 30 of the world’s largest public companies;
the leading property-casualty insurer globally;
among the top 5 in the life/health insurance business;
the worldwide leader of travel insurance, assistance services and personal services;
the leading strategic partner to the automotive industry, serving over 40 car brands in more than 30 countries;
among the top 5 asset managers globally;
the global leader in credit insurance;
among the top 5 in the industrial insurance business;
included in the Dow Jones Sustainability Index since 2000 with top ranking positions.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Capital (e.g. Solvency II); Sustainability/ Sustainable Finance; Consumer Protection; Data & Digital; Insurance and Asset Management Products (i.e. pensions); Capital Markets Union; Long Term Investments; Supervision; Financial Reporting
